FormDefinition.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <cms:formdefinition xmlns="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/std.ui.controls.lib/1.0" xmlns:internal="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/internal.ui.controls.lib/1.0" xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/std.function.lib/1.0" xmlns:cms="http://www.composite.net/ns/management/bindingforms/1.0"> <cms:bindings> <cms:binding name="DocumentTitle" type="System.String" /> <cms:binding name="InstalledPackageInformation" type="Composite.Core.PackageSystem.InstalledPackageInformation" /> <cms:binding name="InstallDate" type="System.String" /> <cms:binding name="IsTrial" type="System.Boolean" /> <cms:binding name="TrialExpire" type="System.String" optional="true" /> </cms:bindings> <cms:layout iconhandle="package-view-installedinfo"> <cms:layout.label> <cms:read source="DocumentTitle" /> </cms:layout.label> <PlaceHolder>
<FieldGroup Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.FieldGroupLabel}"> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.NameTextLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="InstalledPackageInformation.Name" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.VersionTextLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="InstalledPackageInformation.Version" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.AuthorTextLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="InstalledPackageInformation.Author" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.DateTextLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="InstallDate" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.UserTextLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="InstalledPackageInformation.InstalledBy" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> </FieldGroup>
<f:BooleanCheck> <f:BooleanCheck.CheckValue> <cms:read source="IsTrial" /> </f:BooleanCheck.CheckValue> <f:BooleanCheck.WhenTrue>
<FieldGroup Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.TrialInfoFieldGroupLabel}"> <TextArea Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.TrialInformationLabel}" Text="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.TrialInformationText}" /> <TextBox Type="ReadOnly" Label="${Composite.Plugins.PackageElementProvider, ViewInstalledInformation.TrialExpireLabel}"> <TextBox.Text> <cms:read source="TrialExpire" /> </TextBox.Text> </TextBox> </FieldGroup> </f:BooleanCheck.WhenTrue> </f:BooleanCheck>
</PlaceHolder> </cms:layout> </cms:formdefinition>

Dictionary.type: <t n="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"> <t n="System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" /> <t n="System.Object, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" /> </t>

<t n="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"> <t n="System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" /> <t n="System.Collections.Generic.List`1, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"> <t n="Composite.Data.Validation.ClientValidationRules.ClientValidationRule,Composite" /> </t> </t>

List.type: <t n="System.Collections.Generic.List`1, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089"> <t n="System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" /> </t>
